thread.title: Operations Intern-Summer 2016: End of May-Sep. - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Operations Intern-Summer 2016: End of May-Sep. - Sports Management

title: Operations Intern-Summer 2016: End of May-Sep. - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-14-2015 Brief Job Description: Interns will help with the administrative duties to include answering the phone calls, purchase orders, copying, and researching upcoming projects in the operational department   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
